sentences.sContent: His books have sold more than 20 million copies worldwide.
sentences.sCn: 他的书在全世界卖出了两千多万本。

sentences.sContent: ...Perhaps the most profound changes will come when the five billion people worldwide who currently lack Internet access get online...
...Over two billion people worldwide now have access to vastly more information than ever before...

trans.tranOther: If something exists or happens worldwide, it exists or happens throughout the world
